subhero: Write your ideas. Keep you docs safe and private. Decide where your data goes.
pitch_data_choice_subtitle: Your notes stay with you. Store them locally on your device for complete offline access, or sync with a cloud service of your choice—your data, your control.
pitch_ai_choice_subtitle: You can choose from a variety of open-source AI agents to suit your needs. Run then locally for privacy.
pitch_no_lockin_subtitle: We use public file formats and make it easy to export your data. No lock in to a specific system or service.
pitch_pretty_design_subtitle: Nosso editor é rápido, responsivo and bem desenhado para a sua melhor experiência. Aproveite da melhor experiência ao construir suas idéias.
